name: Total War: Rome II - Nomadic Tribes Culture Pack
name_original: Total War: Rome II - Nomadic Tribes Culture Pack
description:
Total War: Rome II - Nomadic Tribes Culture Pack is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by SEGA. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Total War: Rome II - Nomadic Tribes Culture Pack on PC.
